articles.title: Oil ETFs Rally Amid Intensifying U.S.-Venezuela Tension
articles.mainIdea: Oil ETFs Rally Amid Intensifying U.S.-Venezuela Tension
articles.summary: Zacks: Oil ETFs Rally Amid Intensifying U.S.-Venezuela Tension. Oil ETFs are rallying as U.S.-Venezuela maritime clashes lift crude prices, adding a geopolitical risk premium. Related tickers mentioned: BNO, CL=F, COP, CVX, UCO, VENAX, XLE, XOM.

articles.title: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES
articles.mainIdea: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES
articles.summary: Engadget: Samsung will show off its expanded Micro RGB TV series at CES. Samsung has announced that it will be showing off an entire lineup of Micro RGB TVs at CES 2026 ranging from 55- to 115-inch models.
